text: Our Olympic festival was fashioned after the Olympiad of 330 B.C. And so, we made historically correct chitons to wear at the Sunol Water Temple.
These Olympic wrestlersâ€‹ compete to win by their strength and balance!
Our Olympic judge prepares the athletes to put forth their best efforts in a wrestling match.
Running lapse around the Water Temple as a team.
On the last lap the Olympians need to call up their endurance and power to reach the finish line.
As the judge looks on, one athlete dashes toward her long jump.
Lots of practice makes good form for the shot put.
